advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access information about a user's contacts
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

cves.credit: Noah Roskin-Frazee and Prof. J. (ZeroClicks.ai Lab)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: An issue was addressed with improved handling of temporary files.

advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to access private information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.impact: A user may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: A process may gain admin privileges without proper authentication
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code as root from the Lock Screen
advisories.description: The issue was addressed by restricting options offered on a locked device.

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved handling of files.

advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to monitor keystrokes without user permission
advisories.description: An authentication issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access protected user data
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed by removing vulnerable code and adding additional checks.

advisories.impact: Processing an image may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code out of its sandbox or with certain elevated privileges
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improvements to the sandbox.

cves.credit: Yiğit Can YILMAZ (@yilmazcanyigit), and Csaba Fitzl (@theevilbit) of Offensive Security

advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to access connected network volumes mounted in the home directory
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access protected user data
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

cves.credit: Zhongquan Li (@Guluisacat) of Dawn Security Lab of JingDong

advisories.impact: Opening a maliciously crafted file may lead to unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by updating to Vim version 9.0.1969.
